sentence:
74(b)) is amended--

(1) in paragraph (2), by striking ``and'' at the end;

(2) in paragraph (3)(F), by striking the period at the end       and inserting ``; and''; and

(3) by adding at the end the following:

``(4) that the Secretary shall prioritize the adoption of       improved grain grading technology to provide for efficient,       accurate, and consistent grading of grain.''.
title: United States Grain Standards Reauthorization Act of 2025

sentence:
9803(b)) is amended--

(1) in paragraph (2), by striking ``; and'' and inserting a       semicolon;

(2) in paragraph (3), by striking the period at the end and       inserting ``; and''; and

(3) by adding at the end the following:

``(4) identify locations and events in the United States       that are important to music tourism and facilitate and       promote domestic travel and tourism to those locations and       events.''.
title: American Music Tourism Act of 2025

sentence:
6704(b)(2)) is amended--

(1) in subparagraph (B), by striking ``and'' at the end;

(2) in subparagraph (C), by striking the period at the end       and inserting ``; and''; and

(3) by adding at the end the following:

``(D) the State of Utah.''.
title: Utah Wildfire Research Institute Act of 2025

sentence:
1395jjj(c)(1)) is amended--

(1) in subparagraph (A), by striking ``and'' at the end;

(2) in subparagraph (B), by striking the period at the end       and inserting ``; and''; and

(3) by adding at the end the following new subparagraph:

``(C) in the case of performance years beginning on or       after January 1, 2026, primary care services provided under       this title by an ACO professional described in subsection       (h)(1)(B).''.
title: Statements on Introduced Bills and Joint Resolutions

sentence:
(a) Quarterly Fees.--Section 1930(a)(6)(B) of title 28,       United States Code, is amended--

(1) in clause (i), by striking ``5-year'' and inserting       ``10-year''; and

(2) in clause (ii)--

(A) in subclause (I)--

(i) by inserting ``the greater of'' before ``0.4''; and

(ii) by striking ``and'' at the end and inserting ``or'';       and

(B) in subclause (II), by striking ``0.8'' and inserting       ``0.9''.
title: Bankruptcy Administration Improvement Act of 2025
